thread.section_title: The Iroquois New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful Stay!
thread.title_full: Wonderful Stay! - Review of The Iroquois New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Judith Ann K
title: Wonderful Stay!
text: The service, accommodations, and location were excellent. We highly recommend the Iroquois for business and pleasure. It is near theaters, trains, buses to almost everywhere. The staff were very warm and helpful. Only issue was a noisy toilet and a constantly humming machine of some sort nearby.
